### [Some things you can do to participate:]{style="color: #ab4642;"}

<div style=" columns: 2; -webkit-columns: 2; -moz-columns: 2;">
- Add comments to old code or code in progress
- Write a better README
- Archive your code in long-term repository
- Document your research group's coding guidelines
- Add an open license
- Add a citation file to your repo
- Write some contributor guidelines
- Develop a roadmap or checklist of things to do
- Acknowledge contributors
- Make a video demo of your code in action
- List your code in a community
- Cleanup your working directories
- Archive abandoned projects
- Volunteer to review for the Journal of Open Source Software
- Browse critical research on software development practices
- Donate to FOSS projects

</div>
